Onmyoji:Menreiki.NAME: Shikigami: Menreiki
Onmyoji:Menreiki.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. NL Upon being summoned, Switch to a random Faction.

Onmyoji:Seven Sides.NAME: Seven Faces of the Heart
Onmyoji:Seven Sides.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, increased by !M! for each different Faction you have switched to this combat.

Onmyoji:Reborn Of Phoenix.NAME: Swaying Blaze
Onmyoji:Reborn Of Phoenix.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals 2x damage if a Shikigami has died this combat.

Onmyoji:Righteousness.NAME: Righteousness
Onmyoji:Righteousness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Penetrated affects this card !M! times.

Onmyoji:The World.NAME: Fleeting Life
Onmyoji:The World.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Divine !M! cards. Deal !D! damage for each Divined card with an additional effect attached. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Snake Fire.NAME: Sacrificial Fire
Onmyoji:Snake Fire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Penetrated and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.

Onmyoji:Hardworking.NAME: Diligent Practice
Onmyoji:Hardworking.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Set this card's base damage to the amount of damage dealt.

Onmyoji:Madness.NAME: Madness
Onmyoji:Madness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy, gain Unyielding.

Onmyoji:Luck.NAME: Change of Luck
Onmyoji:Luck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Luck 4: Exhaust a random card and play a copy of this card.
Onmyoji:Luck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Luck 4: Exhaust a card and play a copy of this card.

Onmyoji:Poison Feather.NAME: Chin's Feather
Onmyoji:Poison Feather.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is Penetrated, heal HP lost in this combat equal to unblocked damage dealt.

Onmyoji:Storm.NAME: Featherblade Storm
Onmyoji:Storm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Countdown 3: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Onmyoji:Snow Slash.NAME: December's Snow
Onmyoji:Snow Slash.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies that already were Weak.

Onmyoji:Scary Dream.NAME: Shocking Dream
Onmyoji:Scary Dream.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. For every !M! unblocked damage dealt, attach Nightmare to a random card in your draw pile.

Onmyoji:Butterfly.NAME: One Night's Dream
Onmyoji:Butterfly.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a copy of a card in your hand that costs less than or equal to !M!, excluding Power or Shikigami cards.

Onmyoji:Corrupted Punch.NAME: Decayed Punch
Onmyoji:Corrupted Punch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Penetrated, then apply Penetrated equal to the amount of Penetrated on you. NL Deal !D! damage.

Onmyoji:Tai Ji.NAME: Alternation
Onmyoji:Tai Ji.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, swap the attack intent's base damage with this card's base damage. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Phoenix Fire.NAME: Phoenix Flame
Onmyoji:Phoenix Fire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! Projectile damage.

Onmyoji:Double Shoot.NAME: Perfect Shot
Onmyoji:Double Shoot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a copy of this card.

Onmyoji:Trick.NAME: Prank
Onmyoji:Trick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play an Attack, if this card is on top of your draw pile, also play it at no [E] cost.

Onmyoji:Ghost Hand.NAME: Black Flame Hand
Onmyoji:Ghost Hand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Swap the enemy's position with the frontmost enemy.

Onmyoji:Exorcism.NAME: Disaster Expel
Onmyoji:Exorcism.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle this card into your draw pile. NL Deal the same amount of Projectile damage whenever you place this card at the bottom of your draw pile through Divination.
Onmyoji:Exorcism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle this card into your draw pile. NL Deal twice the amount of Projectile damage whenever you place this card at the bottom of your draw pile through Divination.

Onmyoji:Cheat.NAME: Mahjong Cheater
Onmyoji:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Luck 6: Gain [E] . NL otherwise Luck 4: Return this card to your hand.
Onmyoji:Cheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Luck 6: Gain [E] . NL otherwise Luck 2: Return this card to your hand.

Onmyoji:Dice Bomb.NAME: Dice Bomb
Onmyoji:Dice Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Luck 1: Deal damage equal to !M! times the result of your dice roll.

Onmyoji:Nature.NAME: All Knowing
Onmyoji:Nature.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Divine !M! cards.

Onmyoji:Cuteness.NAME: Cute is Justice
Onmyoji:Cuteness.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random Shikigami card(s) to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Luck 6: Shikigami cards created this way have double HP.

Onmyoji:Moonlight Night.NAME: Misty Moonlight
Onmyoji:Moonlight Night.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a strong Faction power corresponding to your current Faction. Each power can only be obtained once per combat.
Onmyoji:Moonlight Night.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain a strong Faction power corresponding to your current Faction. Each power can only be obtained once per combat.

Onmyoji:Cursed Eye.NAME: Cursed Eye
Onmyoji:Cursed Eye.DESCRIPTION: Attach Cursed to !M! random cards in your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a card with an additional effect attached, draw 1 card.

Onmyoji:Maze Of Mind.NAME: Mind Maze
Onmyoji:Maze Of Mind.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Randomize the cost of all Shikigami cards. Whenever you play a Shikigami card, a card in your hand costs 0 this turn.
Onmyoji:Maze Of Mind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of all Shikigami cards. Whenever you play a Shikigami card, a card in your hand costs 0 this turn.

Onmyoji:Cat Wuwan.NAME: Kitten Hiyoribou
Onmyoji:Cat Wuwan.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a token card. At the start of your turn, add !M! copy of it to your hand.

Onmyoji:Wind Of Dragon.NAME: Wind Charm: Dragon
Onmyoji:Wind Of Dragon.DESCRIPTION: Countdown effects will be triggered whenever the corresponding Orb is Channeled.
Onmyoji:Wind Of Dragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Countdown effects will be triggered whenever the corresponding Orb is Channeled.

Onmyoji:Goldfish.NAME: Kingyo of Arakawa
Onmyoji:Goldfish.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that isn't Uncommon or Rare, you have growing chance to play a copy of a random Common card, excluding Power or Shikigami cards. NL This effect can be triggered !M! time(s) per turn.

Onmyoji:Divined Eye.NAME: Eye of Insight
Onmyoji:Divined Eye.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Divine, Divine !M! additional cards.

Onmyoji:Fragile Sound.NAME: Sound of Destruction
Onmyoji:Fragile Sound.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Penetrated, apply !M! more.

Onmyoji:Chef.NAME: Hardcore Chef
Onmyoji:Chef.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a token card, gain 1 Rally. NL This effect can be triggered !M! time(s) per turn.

Onmyoji:News.NAME: Enlightenment
Onmyoji:News.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Lantern to your hand. Whenever you play a *Lantern, upgrade all cards in your hand.

Onmyoji:Chord.NAME: Evolved Kagura
Onmyoji:Chord.DESCRIPTION: On being played and at the start of your turn, Countdown 5: gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

Onmyoji:Dark Dream.NAME: Eternal Slumber
Onmyoji:Dark Dream.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, attach Nightmare to !M! random cards in your draw pile.

Onmyoji:Good And Evil.NAME: Between Good and Evil
Onmyoji:Good And Evil.DESCRIPTION: Kill the current active Shikigami. NL Fill your hand with *Yamata.

Onmyoji:God's Hand.NAME: Godly Move
Onmyoji:God's Hand.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! Shikigami card(s) from your deck into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Netherworld.NAME: Crimson Flowers
Onmyoji:Netherworld.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Rally. NL The next time your Shikigami would take damage, YOU take damage instead.
Onmyoji:Netherworld.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Rally. NL The next time your Shikigami would take damage, YOU take damage instead.

Onmyoji:Contemplate.NAME: Long Contemplation
Onmyoji:Contemplate.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a card into your draw pile. Divine !M! card(s). NL Draw 2 cards.

Onmyoji:All Together.NAME: Be Together!
Onmyoji:All Together.DESCRIPTION: Attach Enmusubi to !M! random cards in your hand and shuffle them into your draw pile. Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Book.NAME: Scroll of Everything
Onmyoji:Book.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Shikigami cards to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Onmyoji:Book.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Shikigami cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Moon.NAME: Luminating Moonlight
Onmyoji:Moon.DESCRIPTION: Divine !M! cards. Set the cost of the top card in your draw pile to 0 this turn.

Onmyoji:Puppet.NAME: Puppet Merchant
Onmyoji:Puppet.DESCRIPTION: Divine 2 cards. NL Draw 1 card. If it has an additional effect attached, gain [E] [E] .
Onmyoji:Puppet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Divine 2 cards. NL Draw 1 card. If it has an additional effect attached, gain [E] [E] [E] .

Onmyoji:Lethe Water.NAME: Mouba's Soup
Onmyoji:Lethe Water.DESCRIPTION: Divine 3 cards. Exhaust 3 cards at the bottom of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Onmyoji:Lethe Water.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Divine 3 cards. Exhaust 3 cards at the bottom of your draw pile.

Onmyoji:Ghost Fire.NAME: Lantern Drain
Onmyoji:Ghost Fire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! Projectile damage X times. Put X *Lanterns into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Onmyoji:Ghost Fire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! Projectile damage X+1 times. Put X+1 *Lanterns into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Peach Blossom.NAME: Revival Blossom
Onmyoji:Peach Blossom.DESCRIPTION: Return 1 Shikigami card from your discard pile to your hand. It costs 1 less [E] this turn. NL Exhaust.
Onmyoji:Peach Blossom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return 1 Shikigami card from your discard pile to your hand. It costs 1 less [E] this turn.

Onmyoji:Buddhist.NAME: Buddha's Light
Onmyoji:Buddhist.DESCRIPTION: You and ALL enemies heal 5 HP. NL Increase your maximum HP by !M! for each HP overhealed this way. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Ensemble.NAME: Ensemble
Onmyoji:Ensemble.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Countdown orbs that have been Channeled this combat.

Onmyoji:Lotus.NAME: Do Good Deeds
Onmyoji:Lotus.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Strength to the enemy this turn. Effect increased by 2 whenever you play another copy of this card.

Onmyoji:Ice Shield.NAME: Frost Core
Onmyoji:Ice Shield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This turn, whenever you are attacked, apply !M! Weak once to the attacker.

Onmyoji:Snake Attack.NAME: Serpent Lash
Onmyoji:Snake Attack.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Penetrated. Whenever you summon a Shikigami, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

Onmyoji:Wind Shield.NAME: Wind Charm: Shield
Onmyoji:Wind Shield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Countdown 2: Gain !M! Block.

Onmyoji:Knowledge.NAME: Wisdom
Onmyoji:Knowledge.DESCRIPTION: Divine !M! cards. Draw 1 card. Shuffle a copy of this card into the discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Onmyoji:Knowledge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Divine !M! cards. Draw 1 card. Shuffle a copy of this card into the discard pile.

Onmyoji:Bird.NAME: Regrow Feathers
Onmyoji:Bird.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Countdown 3: Apply !M! Penetrated to the frontmost enemy.
Onmyoji:Bird.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Countdown 2: Apply !M! Penetrated to the frontmost enemy.

Onmyoji:Kiyohime.NAME: Shikigami: Kiyohime
Onmyoji:Kiyohime.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Whenever you play an Attack, apply an equal amount of Penetrated instead of dealing damage.

Onmyoji:Akaname.NAME: Shikigami: Akaname
Onmyoji:Akaname.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Whenever this Shikigami takes damage, gain an equal amount of Block.

Onmyoji:Enmusubi.NAME: Shikigami: Enmusubi
Onmyoji:Enmusubi.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. At the end of your turn, attach Enmusubi to a random card in your draw pile.
Onmyoji:Enmusubi.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned and at the end of your turn, attach Enmusubi to a random card in your draw pile.

Onmyoji:Yamausagi.NAME: Shikigami: Yamausagi
Onmyoji:Yamausagi.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Your Luck dice rolls always result in a 6. Increase Shikigami HP by !M! every time you roll a 6.

Onmyoji:Kusa.NAME: Shikigami: Kusa
Onmyoji:Kusa.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon exiting this Shikigami form, gain [E] and draw !M! cards.

Onmyoji:Komatsu.NAME: Shikigami: Komatsu
Onmyoji:Komatsu.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. When replaced by another Shikigami, Countdown 1: Return this card from your discard pile to your hand.

Onmyoji:Itsumade.NAME: Shikigami: Itsumade
Onmyoji:Itsumade.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned, Countdown 4: Add 2 *Golden *Feathers into your hand.
Onmyoji:Itsumade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned and upon exiting this Shikigami form, Countdown 4: Add 2 *Golden *Feathers into your hand.

Onmyoji:Shuten Doji.NAME: Shikigami: Shuten-doji
Onmyoji:Shuten Doji.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned, gain 1 Unyielding. Whenever this Shikigami takes 3 or more damage, gain !M! Strength.

Onmyoji:Yoto Hime.NAME: Shikigami: Yoto-hime
Onmyoji:Yoto Hime.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned, deal !D! damage, repeated for each Shikigami you have summoned this turn.

Onmyoji:Momo.NAME: Shikigami: Momo
Onmyoji:Momo.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned, heal !M! HP lost in this combat. Whenever you heal HP, gain 1 Strength.

Onmyoji:Shiranui.NAME: Shikigami: Shiranui
Onmyoji:Shiranui.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon exiting this Shikigami form, gain !M! Rally.

Onmyoji:Yamata.NAME: Shikigami: Yamata
Onmyoji:Yamata.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Bokku.NAME: Shikigami: Bokkuman
Onmyoji:Bokku.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned, put 1 *Golden *Seimei at the bottom of your draw pile.
Onmyoji:Bokku.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned, put 1 *Golden *Seimei+ at the bottom of your draw pile.

Onmyoji:Onikiri.NAME: Shikigami: Onikiri
Onmyoji:Onikiri.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon exiting this Shikigami form, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. If it is the enemy's turn, also apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Onmyoji:Hangan.NAME: Shikigami: Hangan
Onmyoji:Hangan.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. Upon being summoned, if the enemy's HP is equal to or less than this Shikigami's HP, kill it.

Onmyoji:Dodomeki.NAME: Shikigami: Dodomeki
Onmyoji:Dodomeki.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. While in this Shikigami form, whenever you Divine, deal Projectile damage equal to the amount of cards Divined.
Onmyoji:Dodomeki.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a Shikigami with !K! HP. While in this Shikigami form, whenever you Divine, deal Projectile damage equal to 2x the amount of cards Divined.

Onmyoji:Golden Seimei.NAME: Golden Seimei
Onmyoji:Golden Seimei.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, deal !M! Projectile damage, then Exhaust this card.

Onmyoji:Red Force.NAME: Power of Red Lotus
Onmyoji:Red Force.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and 1 Unyielding. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Blue Force.NAME: Power of Blue Mist
Onmyoji:Blue Force.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn. NL Exhaust.

Onmyoji:Purple Force.NAME: Power of Violet Rock
Onmyoji:Purple Force.DESCRIPTION: Set your HP to 70% of your maximum HP. NL Exhaust.
